name: Aegislash

attacks.name: King's Shield
attacks.effect: This Pokemon takes 40 less damage during your opponent's next turn. Buster Swing places 5 damage counters instead of 8 next turn.

attacks.name: Buster Swing
attacks.effect: Put 8 damage counters on the Defending Pokemon. This Pokemon takes 20 extra damage from attacks next turn.

flavor: These fearsome spirits take more than just a medium to dispel - oftentimes, a fully armored knight is dispatched to keep them at bay.
